mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tms_projects ( id, code, name, beginDate, endDate, valid, note, createdUser, modifiedUser, createdTime, modifiedTime ) values( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{valid}, #{note}, #{createdUser}, #{modifiedUser}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: update tms_projects set name=#{entity.name}, code=#{entity.code}, beginDate=#{entity.beginDate}, endDate=#{entity.endDate}, valid=#{entity.valid}, note=#{entity.note}, modifiedTime=NOW(), modifiedUser=#{entity.modifiedUser} where id=#{entity.id};
mapper.select: select id,name from tms_projects where valid=1
